page.title: 10DOMESTIC AMENITIES, LINCOLN.
page.content:
{150 children}attending infant, junior and comprehensive schools were asked to state the{number of appliances in {their home} having consulted a given list. The following results were obtained. It was noticable that, although the standard of housing varied, the domestic amenities were fairly consistent in frequency.
TELEVISION SET. {100% VIDEO RECORDER. {52% HOME COMPUTER. {24% WASHING MACHINE. {99% DISHWASHER. {5% FREEZER. {87% FRIDGE. {99% STEREO/MUSIC CENTRE. {82% MICROWAVE OVEN. {23% TELEPHONE. {67%
